entry.title: 5 PCS | 7"x108" Dusty Rose Embroidered Organza Chair Sashes
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 5.99

[About]

Quantity: 5 Chair Sashes
Material: Organza
Color: Dusty Rose
Size: 7 1/2" wide x 108" long
High quality shimmering organza w/ satin embroidery
Edges are serged to form an elegant look when tied into bow form.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


[Information]

 

Avant-Garde Design

Add a dash of elegant sophistication into your wedding and banquet tables with these delicately fashioned see-thru organza chair sashes accented with the standout nature of satin and stunning leaf-motif embroidery. Let this avant-garde design impart a swanky touch to your banquet or folding chairs, exuding a voguish appeal to your event and celebration.

Sheer Organza Fabric

Bring the best out of your satin, polyester, taffeta, or spandex chair covers by adorning them with these chic chair sashes that combine the delicacy of sheer organza fabric with the modern flair of satin Leaf-Motif embroidery and glossy sheen of silky satin borders.

Multi-Use

Further augment the comeliness of these sashes by embellishing them with our rhinestone diamond or pearl chair sash buckles/pins/brooches. Leave your guests totally bedazzled and mesmerized by the regal sheen of your festive merriment.

 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 5 Chair Sashes
  • Material: Organza
  • Color: Dusty Rose
  • Size: 7 1/2" wide x 108" long
  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • How to Care: Hang wash, hang dry only.
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

    Linen Care Instructions
